title: got banned
body: So I was in ranked, chose rammus, a guy on my team bans rammus. So iget toxic and then I get banned for "unsportmanlike" like why the actual fuck do I get that when a guy bans a tank which we didnt even have. So fucking sad

replies.body:
you got banned because you acted like a child after you didn't get your way.


you lost your pick, is the other guy a dick? sure.  But that doesn't mean your team mates have to suffer.

Be the bigger person.

But I had to suffer, like why would the person even do it. I think it might be because I'm bronze 1. But like why. It's like a team game but thne your team doesnt play it and bans your champ?

Which would make your team suffer as the rammus was going to be tank, and we didn't have a tank at all.

People are allowed to ban whatever they want. They are either dicks or maybe they have a reason. For example if our team's jungler is 4th/5th pick and is hovering Master Yi, and they are not communicating, sometimes I will ban that. Not to be a dick. Just so that the enemy team cannot get him first.

Riot gehrin has said they're banning people that are classified as "kind of a dick" so the other guy should have got banned too if this is what you're saying.

Riot doesn't have anything for people who do shit like this and it's always the victim who cops it because they've more vocal about it and confront the fucker about it in-game.
I played with this sort of people before. Basically troll pick then trailing me in the jgl to run it down any lane i was about to gank. No pitty from me, cant play more than 1 champ?

I can, I was just pissed why the person would even ban the champion when I already said I going to have it. And I was going to be the tank so i could peel for adc's and the damage because top laner (pretty sure) banned rammus and chose a bruiser. And no pitty? You have to be kiddin right?
Yea? what about those that didnt ban your champ? huh? What about them? You dont care? The rest of your team has to suffer because of you. Those bronze memes live thank to your kind.

>like why the actual fuck do I get that when a guy bans a tank which we didnt even have.

Choose any other tank that can jungle?
